meanings.definition: A person who has administrative authority over others.
meanings.sent1: The superadministrator made sure everyone followed the rules.
meanings.sent2: The school principal was the superadministrator of the entire staff.
meanings.sent3: The superadministrator decided to have a silly hat day at work.
meanings.sent4: She was like a superadministrator of a well-oiled machine, keeping everything running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The superadministrator's presence was felt in every corner of the office.

meanings.definition: The highest level of administrator in a system or organization.
meanings.sent1: As the superadministrator, he had the final say in all decisions.
meanings.sent2: The CEO was the superadministrator of the company, overseeing all operations.
meanings.sent3: The superadministrator wore a cape to the board meeting for fun.
meanings.sent4: She ruled the company like a superadministrator of a grand kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The superadministrator's office was at the very top floor of the building.
